text: aadare ehemayi kiyalath kiyanawa.
ithin me ekkama hungak ammala alutha upan patiyata hiswasum dala thiyaganna harima aasayi.
hostal katha liyaddi balannako.
ithin godak welawata oya dewal hithata ka waduna..
mema pradeshaye pradhana margaya widiyata salakena prinsas hayiwe me wana wita wasa dama athi bawada kiyawenawa.
ema narthanawedinge mema dasun wides madhyawedinge kamara kacha wala satahan wi thibune melesini.

me wanawita anuradhapura nagaraye pihiti aithihasikawa wadagathkamak athi pujaniya sthanawalath warthamana aanduwata siyalu pakshawala sahaya labewa kiyamin wiwidha kannalaw pawathwa thibena athara nihandawa sitina hitapu aapada kalamanakarana amathya duminda disanayaka mahathage sthawarayan wenas wi warthamana agamathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha athulu aanduwata hithakara thinduwak labewa kiyamin pakshikayan pirisak pereda (30da) rathriye mihinthalaya puja bhumiye pihiti katusaya asala wishesha pujawakda pawathwa thibe.
ek ek ratawala krikat kridakayinta siya ratatama aawenika wu warnawath andum thibe.
mallith ee pitipassen giya.

memagin kanthawa adhi bara thathwayak athnam owun garbhani kalaya thuladi muhuna pamata siduwana sankulatha athara adhi rudhira pidanaya, diyawadiyawa sandaha awadhanam mattame pasuwana bawa kalthiyama dana ganimata hakiyawa labe.

kalapa adhyapana karyalawala putu, mesa nathi adhyakshawaru pawa sitithi. siya rajakari katayuthu sandaha putuwak, mesayak, rajapakari lekhana thaba ganimata almariyak thibima maha merak se salakana rajaye sewakayan sitina bawa amathiwaru dannawa da?

ee aayudha gena giya niladhariya samaga lalith athulathmudali mahatha sakachchawak karana widiyo patiyak thiyanawa.
koyi dura baharaka sita kochchiye mathara aawath anith gamwala ayata wage mathara apita kochchiyen bahinna hadisiyak thibune natha.

"patta rasneyi we*ye oya fan eka dapan., nathnam mata bonna kul wathura ekak wath genen" ...gabata anuwa koha ka gasanne ehema waliyak nisaya.uge katahanda patta mihiri nisa api hithanne uu awurudda gana sindu kiyanawa kiyalaya.
eeka thamayi nidahas sandhanaye manthiwaru pirisak maha bankuwa idiripita karapu maranthika udghoshanaya.hamadama udghoshana,pikatin,wadawarjana huru apita mepe thiyena wisheshathmaya mokakda?

aabadhayak athayi pawasamin malinga ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliye digin digatama krida kirima ohuge anagatha krida diwiyata yahapath ekak nowana bawa shri lanka krikat aayathanaye mathaya wi thibe.krikat loka kusalana tharagawaliya aarambha wimata pera malinga pawasuwe danahise dirgha kalayak thisse pawathina aabadhayak hethuwen dina 5 k eka digata krida kirime balaporoththuwak nomathi bawaya.‚Äùma test krikat kridawen samuganimata apeksha karanawa‚Äù yayi malinga ehidi prakasha kaleya.danahise aabadhaya hethuwen wasara 2007 sita 2010 dakwa test tharagawalata malinga eknowuni.kese wuwada dan pawathwena ayi. pi. el. tharagawaliye tharaga 5 kadi kadulu 11 k dawagena wadima kadulu labhiya lesa malinga dakshatha dakwamin siti.sachin thendulkarge nayakathwayen yuth mumbayi indiyans pilata krida karana malinga dilli deyardewils pilata erehiwa lakunu 13 kata kadulu 5 k binda heliya.malinga krida karana mumbayi indiyans pila tharaga 5 kadi tharaga 3 k jayagena tharaga 2 k parajaya wi atha..

hari kalin lipiye kiwwane bohomayak sailawala thiyena warnadeha gana.ithin me warnadeha 46 pudgalayekta labenne ee pudgalayage mawagen saha jiwawidyathmaka piyagen kiyana dennagenma.ammagen 23kuth thaththagen 23kuth widihata labena me warnadeha yugal ee kiyanne deke godawal 23k widihata salakanda puluwan.me yugal 23n 22k samanya shariraye swabhawaya saha kriyakarithwaya yamanaya karanda dayaka weddi eka yugalak pudgalayage lingaya thiranaya karanda dayaka wenawa.ee yugalata kiyanne linga warnadeha kiyala.
